Speed Runner.description: Complete a level within half the time limit.

Perfectionist.description: Complete 5 levels without making a mistake.

Explorer.description: Find all words in a level.

Night Owl.description: Play the game between midnight and 6 AM.

Early Bird.description: Play the game between 6 AM and noon.

Speed Demon.description: Complete 3 levels in a row within half the time limit.

No Help Needed.description: Complete 5 levels without using any hints.

Mistake Avoider.description: Complete a level with fewer than 3 mistakes.

Unstoppable.description: Complete 10 levels in a row without failing.

Strategist.description: Complete a level with more than 5 minutes remaining.

Comeback King.description: Win a level with less than 1 minute remaining.

Consistent Player.description: Play the game for 7 consecutive days.

Marathon Player.description: Play the game for 30 consecutive days.

Speed Challenger.description: Complete 5 levels within the time limit.
